meanings.definition: A layer of fabric between the outer fabric and lining of a garment.
meanings.sent1: The interlining adds extra warmth to the jacket.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the interlining is smooth before sewing the garment.
meanings.sent3: The interlining decided to take a nap between the fabrics.
meanings.sent4: Like a secret agent, the interlining hides between the layers of the garment.
meanings.sent5: The interlining, like a cozy blanket, snuggled between the fabrics.

meanings.definition: To provide an interlining for a garment.
meanings.sent1: She will interlining the coat to make it warmer.
meanings.sent2: Interlining the dress will give it a better shape.
meanings.sent3: The tailor interlininged the suit with care and precision.
meanings.sent4: His words interlininged the fabric of their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The threads interlining the fabric together like a strong bond.

meanings.definition: The act of interlining a garment.
meanings.sent1: Her interlining of the dress was done beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The interlining of the curtains was a tedious task.
meanings.sent3: The interlining's dance with the fabrics was graceful and precise.
meanings.sent4: The interlining of the garment was like weaving a story with threads.
meanings.sent5: With each stitch, the interlining brought the garment to life.
